1.name: Emotion Inhibition Module
1.description: When taking damage in battle take brings health below 50%, increase own evasion by 15-30%, recover 8% hp in 8 seconds, activates a maximum of 2 times

2.name: Precision Salvo Protocol
2.description: Every main gun shot can be manually aimed, manual aiming damage bonus is increased to 25-40%; Every 20 seconds after the beginning of battle, fire a strong barrage at 50-100% chance (firepower increases with skill level)

3.name: Siren Killer Ⅰ
3.description: Increases the DMG this ship deals to Sirens by 5.0%.

2.name: Summer Environmental Suit
2.description: Gascogne, preparations complete. Confirm directive: Have fun with Maître at the beach —— Maître, please clarify directive: What does "Have fun with Maître at the beach" entail?

strengthenLevel.level20: Secondary Gun+2 | Main Gun Efficiency+10% | Limit Break ★★★★★☆

2.chinese: 加斯科涅，黎塞留级战列舰四号舰，因战争爆发而被迫取消建造…不过这次，加斯科涅将为主人而战，歼灭任何挡在主人面前的敌人
2.chineseTL: Gascogne, Richelieu-class Battleship No. 4. Due to outbreak of war, construction forcefully cancelled... This time, Gascogne fights for Maître. Maître's every enemy will be destroyed.
2.japanese: ガスコーニュ、リシュリュー級戦艦四番艦、戦火により建造頓挫。…今は、主のために戦闘行動を行い、敵を殲滅する
2.english: Gascogne, Richelieu-class battleship number 4, construction canceled due to wartime conditions. Purpose: engage in battle and destroy Master's enemies.

3.chinese: 加斯科涅，唤醒完成。确认指令：将自由与胜利带给主人——您就是主人吗？加斯科涅，为您服务
3.chineseTL: Gascogne, awakening complete. Command acknowledged: Bring freedom and victory to Maître- Are you Maître? Gascogne, at your service.
3.japanese: ガスコーニュ、起動完了。指示確認：主（maître＝メートル）に自由と勝利を――ガスコーニュ、これより奉仕行動を開始する
3.english: Gascogne activation process complete. Directive assigned: secure liberty and victory for Master. Gascogne commencing active service.

4.chinese: 身份确认——欢迎回来，主人
4.japanese: 照合完了――お帰りなさい、主

5.chinese: 装备检查…状态良好，加斯科涅，随时待命
5.chineseTL: Equipment inspection... in good condition. Gascogne, standby.
5.japanese: 兵装検査…状態良好。ガスコーニュ、命令の遂行が可能
5.english: Analyzing armaments... Condition: satisfactory. Gascogne is able to execute orders.

6.chinese: “勾起嘴角”…无法对该行为分析出战术上的意义
6.chineseTL: "Quirk up a smile"...? Unable to analyze the combat purpose behind this action.
6.japanese: 「口角を上げる」…その行動の意義を判断しかねる
6.english: "Raise the corners of your lips"... Unable to determine significance of said action.

7.chinese: 判定——主人的状态属于“偷懒”。对工作会产生影响
7.chineseTL: Conclusion. Maître's current actions, a behavior called "slacking off". This behavior negatively influences work.
7.japanese: 検証完了――主の状態は「サボり」という状態に該当と判断。執務への支障を認む
7.english: Analysis complete. Master identified to be in a state of "slacking off." State evaluated as an impediment to productivity.

8.chinese: “自由行动”…无法对该命令分析出战术上的意义
8.chineseTL: "Operate freely"?... Unable to analyze the combat purpose behind this command.
8.japanese: 「適当にして」…戦術的な意義は分析不可能と判断
8.english: "Do whatever you want"... Analysis of strategic significance of order deemed impossible.

9.chinese: 关于现在舰队的成员，与加斯科涅记录中的信息，以及表情判断记录中的“笑容”的出现频度存在误差
9.chineseTL: In regards to the recorded expression logs of the fleet members and those of Gascogne, there appears to be a difference in the frequency of "smiling".
9.japanese: 所属艦隊の構成員、ガスコーニュの記憶情報と、表情認識記録における「笑顔」の発生頻度に相違点を認む
9.english: Discrepancy detected in the frequency of "smiles" recorded between members of the fleet, Gascogne's recollection, and expression identification database.

11.chinese: 警告，非正常高温，请求检查——
11.chineseTL: Warning. Abnormally high temperatures, inspection requested-
11.japanese: 体温の異常を感知。主、特別検査を――
11.english: Body temperature abnormality detected. Requesting thorough physical examination.

12.japanese: 注意、未完了の任務を確認
12.english: Attention: confirmation required for incomplete missions.

13.japanese: 注意、任務報酬の到着を確認
13.english: Attention: confirmation required for mission rewards.

14.japanese: 注意、新着メールを確認
14.english: Attention: confirmation required for new mail.

15.japanese: アルマニャック、どうぞ
15.english: A glass of armagnac has been prepared.

16.japanese: 注意、委託チームの帰還を確認
16.english: Attention: confirmation required for commission team's return.

18.japanese: 目標視認――殲滅を開始する

19.chinese: 报告，目标歼灭，战斗任务完成
19.chineseTL: Report. Targets destroyed, combat mission complete.
19.japanese: 報告。対象の殲滅を確認、戦闘任務完了
19.english: Report: destruction of targets confirmed. Combat mission complete.

20.chinese: 失败是不被允许的。……请提高加斯科涅的性能，或者进行销毁
20.chineseTL: Failure is not acceptable... Please upgrade the combat capabilities of Gascogne, or proceed to scrap.
20.japanese: 失敗は許されない。……ガスコーニュの機能向上、もしくは廃棄処分を申請する
20.english: Failure is intolerable. Proposal: improve Gascogne's capabilities, or terminate system.

21.english: Armaments activated. Engaging at maximum output.

22.chinese: 作战执行能力下降，需要增援
22.chineseTL: Combat operational capabilities reduced, reinforcements required.
22.japanese: 作戦遂行能力低下、増援を求む
22.english: Combat execution systems failing, requesting support.

23.chinese: 加斯科涅是舰船、兵器，除此以外不存在任何定义
23.chineseTL: Gascogne is a warship, a weapon, there is no other purpose.
23.japanese: ガスコーニュは兵器、艦船、それ以外の定義を認めない
23.english: Gascogne is a weapon and a warship. No other definitions are applicable.

24.chinese: 其他同僚经常会让加斯科涅加入她们于作战任务无益的活动，请主人判断是否需要参加
24.chineseTL: Other colleagues would often invite Gascogne to activities not related to combat missions, requesting Maître to judge whether partipation is required.
24.japanese: 所属艦隊の構成員によるガスコーニュへの、戦術的な意義を有しない行動への参加要請が多数。主のご判断を求む
24.english: Numerous requests for Gascogne's participation in activities without strategic significance received from members of the fleet. Requesting Master's assessment.

25.chinese: 与她人接触过程中，加斯科涅产生了未知的反应，“感情“和”冲动“。请指示对应的行动
25.chineseTL: When interacting with others, Gascogne produces unknown reactions, "Emotion" and "Impulse". Please indicate the appropriate response.
25.japanese: 所属艦隊との構成員の共同行動中に、「カンジョウ」「ショウドウ」の事象が発生。次なる対応の指示を求む
25.english: Phenomena known as "emotions" and "impulses" occur when interacting with members of the fleet. Requesting instructions for achieving satisfactory interaction.

26.chinese: 与主人、与其他同僚接触过程中产生的反应，是“安心”与“喜悦”，这样的“感情”，对主人来说…确实存在战术上的意义
26.chineseTL: The reactions produced when interacting with Maître and other colleagues, are "Relief" and "Happiness". For Maître, such "Emotions"... do indeed hold tactical meaning.
26.japanese: 接触における「カンジョウ」を分析し、「アンシン」「ヨロコビ」と判断。主の希望上…戦術的な意義はあると認む
26.english: "Emotions" generated from physical contact were analyzed and interpreted as "comfort" and "happiness." Concluding that this holds strategic significance if this is Master's intention.

27.chinese: 加斯科涅在舰队生活中学到了许多“情感”，有了许多原本没有的“烦恼”，但也理解了“乐趣”。如果主人希望，加斯科涅现在可以开放自己“感情”对应的功能。主人，“谢谢你”
27.chineseTL: Gascogne has learned many "Emotions" during life in the fleet, evoking a lot of "Worries" that were not there before, but also understood what is "Joy". If Maître desires, Gascogne can now release the functions module corresponding to "Feelings". Maître, "Thanks."
27.japanese: 「カンジョウ」の蓄積作業の過程において、「ナヤミ」「タノシミ」なる事象を確認・分析に成功。主のご希望なら、「カンジョウ」の開放及び行動機能の更新が可能。主、「ありがとう」
27.english: Phenomena known as "worries" and "hopes" were observed and successfully classified during routine "emotion" cache analysis. System can be updated with permissions to access and act upon "emotions" if Master so wishes. Thank you, Master.

28.chinese: 现在的加斯科涅已经能够理解了，“爱”，那是不求回报的付出，又是期望回报的渴望，是热情，是心跳，是光——谢谢您，主人，这枚戒指会是加斯科涅最珍贵的宝物
28.chineseTL: Gascogne is now able to understand. "Love", is a devotion without expectation of returns, yet also the expectation of desire, passion, heartbeat, light- Thank you, Maître, this ring will be Gascogne's most precious treasure.
28.japanese: 今なら理解できる、「愛」という感情――それは心のときめき、見返りを求めない相手への貢献、渇望、情熱、そして「光」……この指輪こそ、ガスコーニュにとって一番大切な宝物。主、愛しています
28.english: I now understand the emotion known as love. It is the throbbing of one's heart; the gratitude, longing, warmth, and light one feels for a person who does not seek recompense. This ring is the greatest gift I could ask for. I love you, Master.

29.japanese: リシュリュー様、戦術支持を

31.japanese: 現段階の状態補強に有用と見た目
31.japaneseTL: The current stage of status enhancement appears useful.

1.chinese: 加斯科涅，准备完成。确认指令：陪伴主人在沙滩玩耍——…主人请求对指示“在沙滩玩耍”的详细说明
1.chineseTL: Gascogne, preparations complete. Confirm directive: Have fun with Maître at the beach —— Maître, please clarify directive: What does "Have fun with Maître at the beach" entail?
1.japanese: ガスコーニュ、装備変更完了。指示確認：主（メートル）と砂浜で遊びを――メートル、「砂浜で遊び」について詳細の指示を求む

2.chinese: 加斯科涅，准备完成。确认指令：陪伴主人在沙滩玩耍——…主人请求对指示“在沙滩玩耍”的详细说明
2.chineseTL: Gascogne, preparations complete. Confirm directive: Have fun with Maître at the beach —— Maître, please clarify directive: What does "Have fun with Maître at the beach" entail?

3.chinese: 欢迎回来，主人。关于“自由行动”，加斯科涅正在进行数据累积以进行定性定义
3.chineseTL: Welcome back, Maître. Regarding "Autonomous operation", Gascogne is currently gathering data for a definitive elucidation.
3.japanese: おかえりなさい、主。ガスコーニュ、「自由行動」のルーチン定義に関するログ蓄積作業を遂行中

4.chinese: 主人要对加斯科涅进行检查吗？
4.chineseTL: Does Maître wish to inspect Gascogne?
4.japanese: ガスコーニュの検査、どうぞ

5.chinese: 风速、气温，气象数据符合记录平均值，对航行没有影响
5.japanese: 風速・気温、気象データは記録通りの平均値を確認、航行への影響は無しと判断

6.chinese: 发现非敌性生物，主人，请指示下一步行动
6.japanese: 非敵性生物と接触を確認。メートル、対応のご指示を

7.chinese: 一起游泳吗？请稍等，加斯科涅需要准备游泳圈…——“游泳不需要游泳圈”的指令和记录中出现不一致——
7.japanese: 「一緒に泳ぐ」――指示確認、浮き輪を要すると認む。……泳ぎに浮き輪は「不要」の判断について記録情報の照合における不一致が発生――

8.chinese: 主人的眼神…无法判断战术意义
8.chineseTL: Maître's gaze.. unable to explicate tactical intent.
8.japanese: 主の視線、戦術的な意義ありと分析しかねる

9.chinese: 主人。加斯科涅，自检中发现非正常高温
9.chineseTL: Maître. Gascogne's self diagnostics detects abnormal body temperature.
9.japanese: 主、ガスコーニュ、自己検査中に体温の異常を感知

10.chinese: 加斯科涅准备了饮料和食物，主人，请问是否需要进行营养补充
10.chineseTL: Gascogne has prepared drinks and snacks. Maître, do you require nutritional replenishment?
10.japanese: ガスコーニュ、水分及び栄養補給用の物資を確保。主、摂食の要否についてご指示を

1.chinese: 身份确认——欢迎回来，主人
1.japanese: 照合完了――お帰りなさい、主

2.chinese: 装备检查…状态良好，加斯科涅，随时待命
2.chineseTL: Equipment inspection... in good condition. Gascogne, standby.
2.japanese: 兵装検査…状態良好。主、ガスコーニュになんなりとご命令を
2.english: Analyzing armaments... Condition: satisfactory. Please inform me if you have any orders, Master.

3.chinese: “勾起嘴角”…了解。是这样吗…？不大明白…
3.chineseTL: "Quirk up a smile"... Understood. Like this...? I don't quite get it...
3.japanese: 「口角を上げる」…命令受諾した。こ、こう…？よくわからない…
3.english: "Raise the corners of your lips"... Executing order. L-like this...? I may be doing it wrong...

4.chinese: 判定——主人的状态属于“偷懒”……不大好呢…
4.chineseTL: Conclusion. Maître's current actions belong to a behavior called "slacking off"... That's not good...
4.japanese: 検証完了――主の状態は「サボり」であると。「サボり」、よくない
4.english: Analysis complete. Master is in a state of "slacking off." Slacking off is not good.

5.chinese: “自由行动”…主人，加斯科涅应该做什么…？
5.chineseTL: "Operate freely"?... Maître, what should Gascogne do...?
5.japanese: 「適当にして」…主、ガスコーニュは一体何をすれば…？
5.english: "Do whatever you want"... Master, how am I meant to do "whatever"...?

6.chinese: 关于现在舰队的成员，与加斯科涅记录中的信息，以及表情判断记录中的“笑容”的出现频度存在误差。为什么大家都在笑？
6.chineseTL: In regards to the recorded expression logs of the fleet members and those of Gascogne, there appears to be a difference in the frequency of "smiling". Why is everyone always smiling?
6.japanese: 所属艦隊の構成員、ガスコーニュのリュウコツの情報との相違を認む。なぜ、みんな笑顔をしている？
6.english: Discrepancy detected between the information in my core and the members of the fleet. Why does everyone smile?

7.chinese: 主人，请把一切都交给加斯科涅
7.japanese: 主、なんでもガスコーニュにおまかせを
7.english: I'm waiting for any order you may have, Master.

8.chinese: 警告，非正常高温。主人，加斯科涅到底是怎么了……？
8.chineseTL: Warning. Abnormally high temperatures. Maître, what is going on with Gascogne...?
8.japanese: 体温に異常を感知。主、ガスコーニュはど、どうなってるの…？
8.english: Body temperature abnormality detected. Master, what's happening to me...?

9.chineseTL: Notice. Missions are not yet completed- Maître?
9.japanese: 注意、未完了の任務を確認。主…？
9.english: Attention: confirmation required for incomplete missions. Master...?

10.japanese: 注意、任務報酬の到着を確認。あぁ…！
10.english: Attention: confirmation required for mission rewards. Wow...!

11.japanese: 注意、新着メールを確認。こ、コホン！
11.english: Attention: confirmation required for new mail. A-ahem!

12.chinese: 雅马邑白兰地，请慢慢享用
12.japanese: アルマニャック。どうぞごゆっくり
12.english: Here is a glass of armagnac, if you'd like.

13.japanese: 注意、委託チームの帰還を確認。ふぅ……
13.english: Attention: confirmation required for commission team's return. Whew...

15.chinese: 加斯科涅在舰队生活中学到了许多“情感”，有了许多原本没有的“烦恼”，但也理解了“乐趣”。您对加斯科涅的期望，加斯科涅现在明白了，发自内心地感谢您，主人
15.chineseTL: Gascogne has learned many "Emotions" during life in the fleet. There are lots of "Worries" that were not there before, but also understood what is "Joy". The hopes you placed in Gascogne, Gascogne now understands. Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Maître.
15.japanese: この艦隊で学んだ多くの「感情」、「悩み」、そして「楽しみ」……主がガスコーニュに望むこと、今ようやく理解した。主、本当に、ありがとう……
15.english: I've studied many emotions, worries, and hopes during my time in this fleet... Now I finally understand what you expect of me, Master. Thank you so, so much, Master...

1.chinese: 加斯科涅，准备完成。确认指令：陪伴主人在沙滩玩耍——…主人，在沙滩玩耍，应该做点什么…？
1.japanese: ガスコーニュ、衣装変更完了。指示確認：主（メートル）と砂浜で遊びを――メートル、「砂浜で遊び」…ガスコーニュは一体何をすれば……？

2.chinese: 欢迎回来，主人。嗯？加斯科涅正在尝试进行“自由行动”…
2.japanese: おかえりなさい、主。ええと、ガスコーニュ、「自由行動」、やってみている…

3.chinese: 主人要对加斯科涅进行检查吗…？现在？
3.japanese: メートル、ガスコーニュの検査を……？い、今…？

4.chinese: 盛夏的海风…这就是“舒服”的感觉吗…？
4.japanese: 夏の風…主、これが「気持ちいい」感情なの……？

5.chinese: 这是…刚刚发现的新伙伴，来跟指挥官打个招呼吧——…开玩笑的
5.japanese: この子は……主、挨拶しているらしいよ？…今のは「冗談」で合ってるの？

6.chinese: 一起游泳吗？请稍等，加斯科涅准备一下游泳圈…——游泳不需要游泳圈的吗…？
6.japanese: 「一緒に泳ぐ」…ガスコーニュ、浮き輪を持ってくる…浮き輪は「いらないもの」なの？

7.chinese: 主人的眼神…似乎不太对劲

8.chinese: 对不起，主人…加斯科涅似乎有些、异常…
8.japanese: 主、ごめんなさい…ガスコーニュ、変に熱い感じがする…よね……？

9.chinese: 加斯科涅姑且准备了一点饮料和食物，应该这样就好吧……？主人，要来点吗？…
9.japanese: ガスコーニュ、お飲み物とお食事を準備したけど……主、どう？
